original_title: ジュリエット×２ ～恋音ミュージカル～
overview: Verona Girls’ High School has been holding its legendary theater festival for 120 years. Julie and Yuri are competing with each other to appear as the star of the play. When they find out the school will become co-educational and a male transfer student appears, the battle intensifies.
title: Juliet Juliet - The Sound of Love Musical
